publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4149 Margaret Mitchell: 70th Anniversary of the Royal Gibraltar Regiment—That the Parliament notes that the Royal Gibraltar Regiment will fire the guns at Edinburgh Castle on Tuesday 2 June 2009 to commemorate the 70th anniversary of the regiment; further notes that this celebration pays tribute to the association that Gibraltar has enjoyed with many Scottish regiments; congratulates the Royal Gibraltar Regiment on its 70th anniversary, and wishes the regiment every success for the next 70 years.

S3M-4149 Margaret Mitchell: 70th Anniversary of the Royal Gibraltar Regiment—That the Parliament notes that the Royal Gibraltar Regiment will fire the guns at Edinburgh Castle on Tuesday 2 June 2009 to commemorate the 70th anniversary of the regiment; further notes that this celebration pays tribute to the association that Gibraltar has enjoyed with many Scottish regiments; congratulates the Royal Gibraltar Regiment on its 70th anniversary, and wishes the regiment every success for the next 70 years. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Aitken*

S3M-4149 70th Anniversary of the Royal Gibraltar Regiment (lodged on 14 May 2009) Murdo Fraser*, John Lamont*, Nanette Milne*, Christina McKelvie*, Jackson Carlaw*, Jamie McGrigor*, Ted Brocklebank*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-4149 70th Anniversary of the Royal Gibraltar Regiment (lodged on 14 May 2009) Mary Scanlon*
S3M-4149 70th Anniversary of the Royal Gibraltar Regiment (lodged on 14 May 2009) Rhoda Grant*, Annabel Goldie*
S3M-4149 70th Anniversary of the Royal Gibraltar Regiment (lodged on 14 May 2009) Jim Tolson*
S3M-4149 70th Anniversary of the Royal Gibraltar Regiment (lodged on 14 May 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*, Stuart McMillan*
